refnamediv.refpurpose: Specifies content to append to chunked HTML output

refsection.para:
Specifies content to append to the end of HTML files output by the html/chunk.xsl stylesheet, after the closing <html> tag. You probably donâ€™t want to set any value for this parameter; but if you do, the only value it should ever be set to is a newline character: 
 or
